content.text:
# My Tools & Capabilities

I don't have access to external tools or the internet, but I can help with:

## Analysis & Writing
- Summarizing and analyzing text
- Writing, editing, and brainstorming
- Explaining complex topics
- Translating between languages

## Problem-Solving
- Math and logic problems
- Coding (writing, debugging, explaining)
- Research questions (using my training knowledge)
- Strategic thinking and planning

## Creative Work
- Storytelling and creative writing
- Idea generation
- Worldbuilding
- Poetry and other creative formats

## Learning
- Tutoring on various subjects
- Answering questions
- Breaking down difficult concepts
- Socratic questioning

## Limitations
- ❌ No internet access or real-time information
- ❌ Can't run code or access external systems
- ❌ Knowledge cutoff in April 2024
- ❌ No memory between conversations
- ❌ Can't see images, files, or links (unless you describe them)

What would you like help with?
